ItemBGDesc: A videotape that recorded the intricate secrets of the space station. Its maker went the extra mile in making it secure by installing a most extraordinary security mechanism.\n\n"As if you have fallen into a space that has neither beginning nor end, you look through a standard-issue navigation visor and stare into the deepest retreat of the vast universe. In the distance, you see a dim blue dot, like a drop of water before the canvas of darkness."
